EmailTemplate.subject: Re: Application to NCS with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c}
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Thank you for applying for the Project Volunteer role at NCS with The Challenge.
Unfortunately, we will not be taking your application further. Due to the scale of our recruitment we cannot provide feedback at this stage.
Thank you for your interest in NCS with The Challenge.
Best Wishes,
The Challenge
